p: Using Vc as a control, the antioxidant activity of PHS was studied by DPPH method, and their half-inhibitory concentration values (IC 50) were calculated. The absorbance of PHS at 517 nm was measured by UV–visible spectrophotometer (Hitachi, Japan) [ 23]. The percentage of free radical scavenging activity is determined by the difference in absorbance of DPPH between the control and the sample.
